post.author: nielsmillikan
post.body:
This may be an improper area to post but I couldnt' find any lesser one than this. I've been searching for a .md3 exporter for max 2008 for sometime now. I could only find one on maxplugins.de but that doesn't work. It gives this error while loading 'Error code:14001 - The application failed to start because its side by side configuration is incorrect'

Can anyone give me a tested working plugin please?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: We don't work with MD3 so it's no surprise that nobody has responded.
